title: Not sure what typeface this is...
content:
Any idea what "PrimeTime Learning" is using?

Whatever it is, it's not particularly pleasing to my taste. But I need to change some text/colours, and was provided a flat JPG.

Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018085940/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_56.jpg) | 14.61 KB |
author: kylefox

comments.content:
Hmm maybe. Looks really close. Probably good enough for my needs, at least.

Thanks.

Good word, and helpful link Eric.

- Mike Yanega
